title: How to Assign Category and Browse Terms to Your Amazon Listings - E-commerce Tutorials

tactics.name: Assign Correct Category and Browse Terms
tactics.description: Properly label product categories and browse terms to improve search visibility and buy box chances.
steps: Use the Browse Tree Guide (BTG) to find valid item type keywords
Check data definitions tab for field requirements
Enter up to 50 characters per search term field
source_quotes: when you label your category correctly you surely will have a better chance of appearing of the search results

heuristics.name: Prioritize High-traffic Categories
heuristics.condition: If product category has high BSR and review count, prioritize optimization
source_quotes: Amazon customers find products through search and browse each category

claims.statement: Amazon's category structure allows customers to refine searches through subcategories
source_quotes: each category is divided into sub categories in amazon.com when customer browse

niche_patterns.example: movie shirt + fashion accessory + casual wear
niche_patterns.description: Combine product type with usage scenarios and contextual categories for better browse term optimization
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Targets specific customer intent within broader categories
source_quotes: when you label your category correctly you surely will have a better chance of appearing of the search results
